means: 否定论，消极论，反对癖性

word_mean: 违拗症：做一般人在相似情况下相反的行为，或做出恰恰相反于他人让他做的，以及正常欲念所要他做的病态倾向
例如在紧张型精神分裂症时，常遇到当让病人举起手时，他却感到被迫将手垂下
让他伸开手掌，他却攥起拳来

sentence.Network_cn: 哲学家往往偏重于否定态度.

sentence.Network_en: Negativism a spouse leads to disillusionment over time as love declines.
sentence.Network_cn: 随着时间流逝,爱情慢慢消失,伴侣的消极会导致幻灭.

sentence.Network_en: Optimism diverts our attention away from negativism and channels it into positive, constructive thinking.
sentence.Network_cn: 乐观将我们的注意力从消极中转移出来,并导向积极有创造力的想法中.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 2．违拗症（negativism）指患者对要求做的动作表现抗拒，如要他张口，他反而咬得更紧；要他坐时，他偏站立。口中唾液积聚不吐出、小.
negatively 否定地negativism 抗拒症negativist 否定论者
...)舍勒的同代人承认存在的孤独，赞同直至今天仍不时出现在20世纪哲学中的否定论(negativism)。他们的思想多少遮住了舍勒思想的光彩.

auth_sentence.content: But most critics offered a detached and complacent negativism.
auth_sentence.res_content: But most critics offered a detached and complacent negativism.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But most critics offered a detached and complacent negativism.

auth_sentence.content: What worries me, however, is the near hysteria of negativism I see on this blog.

auth_sentence.content: It tells you everything you've been carrying, the negativism, the grudges, how meaningless they all are, he says.
